Question
========

Which of the following is not a valid name in R?

Answerlist
----------
* my_var
* \`76ers\`
* _my_var
* 76ers

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* This is valid, underscores can be used in names
* Names wrapped in "`" can contain arbitrary characters
* This is not valid. Names cannot *begin* with underscores
* This is valid
